comment: Absolutely stunning! The flavor was so gentle and elegant, and the sakura jelly was like a piece of art. Perfect for spring afternoons.
Beautiful presentation and very light texture. I wish the floral flavor was a bit stronger, but still one of the prettiest desserts I’ve had.
Melt-in-your-mouth smooth. Not too sweet, just the right hint of cherry blossom. Ideal for people who love subtle flavors.
Nice concept, and very aesthetic. I personally prefer richer flavors, but this is lovely for those who enjoy delicate desserts.
Reminds me of cherry blossom season in Kyoto. Light, dreamy, and so refreshing. I’ll definitely make this again!
